News.Title: Alkali Metals Limited Executive Director Y.V. Prashanth Completes Tenure, Transitions to Non-Executive Role
News.Summary: Alkali Metals Limited announced that Y.V. Prashanth has completed his tenure as Executive Director effective November 10, 2025. The Board of Directors took note of this transition during their 269th meeting held on November 7, 2025. Prashanth will continue serving the company as a Non-Executive Director from the same date.

News.Title: Alkali Metals Reports Net Loss of ₹91.34 Lakhs in Q2 FY26
News.Summary: Alkali Metals Limited reported a net loss of ₹91.34 lakhs for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, compared to a net loss of ₹145.31 lakhs in the previous quarter. Total income decreased to ₹882.67 lakhs from ₹2,064.98 lakhs in the prior quarter. For the half-year period, the company recorded a net loss of ₹206.65 lakhs against ₹521.96 lakhs in the same period last year. Revenue breakdown shows domestic sales at ₹111.58 lakhs and export sales at ₹765.78 lakhs for the quarter. The company's total assets stood at ₹8,349.08 lakhs as of September 30, 2025, down from ₹9,293.63 lakhs as of March 31, 2025. Cash and cash equivalents increased to ₹6.43 lakhs from ₹4.15 lakhs. The Board of Directors approved these unaudited financial results in their meeting held on November 7, 2025.

News.Title: Alkali Metals Sets August 14, 2025 as Record Date for Potential Dividend Declaration
News.Summary: Alkali Metals Limited has set August 14, 2025 as the record date for determining shareholder eligibility for dividend payments, subject to approval at the company's 57th Annual General Meeting scheduled for August 21, 2025. The company, which manufactures chemicals including sodium compounds, pharmaceutical intermediates, and active pharmaceutical ingredients, communicated this timeline to stock exchanges NSE and BSE. The dividend declaration remains conditional upon approval at the upcoming AGM.

News.Title: Alkali Metals Reports Q2 Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Alkali Metals has announced its Q2 revenue, reporting 205 million rupees compared to 168 million rupees in the same quarter last year, representing a year-over-year increase.

News.Title: Alkali Metals Reports Q2 Net Loss
News.Summary: Alkali Metals Limited has reported a net loss of 19 million rupees in the second quarter, compared to a profit of 1 million rupees in the same period last year.
